<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104212</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104212</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>20101449</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Presentation About SciVee by Apryl Bailey</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Darstellung über SciVee durch Apryl Bailey</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Présentation au sujet de SciVee par Apryl Bailey</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Apresentação sobre SciVee por Apryl Bailey</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Presentazione circa SciVee da Apryl Bailey</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παρουσίαση για SciVee από Apryl Bailey</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Presentación sobre SciVee de Apryl Bailey</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An audio slide presentation to share, show and embed. This describes the site in general, the elements of SciVee, use of open access literature on SciVee and SciVee's history.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Audioplättchendarstellung zum Anteil, 
Erscheinen und betten ein. Dieses beschreibt die Site im 
allgemeinen, die Elemente von SciVee, Gebrauch von geöffneter Zugriff
Literatur auf SciVee und SciVees Geschichte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une présentation de diapositives d'acoustique à 
la part, exposition et encastrent. Ceci décrit le site en 
général, les éléments de SciVee, utilisation de la littérature 
ouverte d'accès sur l'histoire de SciVee et de SciVee.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma apresentação de corrediça do áudio à 
parte, mostra e encaixa. Isto descreve o local no general, os 
elementos de SciVee, uso da literatura aberta do acesso no history de 
SciVee e de SciVee.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una presentazione di scorrevole dell'audio alla 
parte, esposizione ed incastona. Ciò descrive il luogo in 
generale, gli elementi di SciVee, uso della letteratura aperta di 
accesso su storia dello SciVee e di SciVee.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ηχητική παρουσίαση φωτογραφικών διαφανειών στο 
μερίδιο, εμφανίζει και ενσωματώνει. Αυτό περιγράφει την 
περιοχή γενικά, τα στοιχεία SciVee, χρήση της ανοικτής 
βιβλιογραφίας πρόσβασης στην ιστορία SciVee και SciVee's.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una presentación de diapositiva del audio a la 
parte, demostración y embute. Esto describe el sitio en 
general, los elementos de SciVee, uso de la literatura abierta del 
acceso en la historia de SciVee y de SciVee.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:APRYL
FN:APRYL
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>20101449</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution 3.0</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104212</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/presentation-about-scivee-by-apryl-bailey</uri>

    </item>
  </manifestation>
